items.sentence: Tom and Mary seem to really be in love with each other.
Tom and Mary went into the forest to collect mushrooms.
Tom and Mary went trick-or-treating with their friends.
I\'m sorry that I missed this morning\'s staff meeting.
I\'m sure Tom wouldn\'t mind babysitting your children.
She didn\'t show up at the party, but nobody knows why.
Tom hasn\'t been on speaking terms with Mary for years.
One thing Tom really enjoys is playing chess with Mary.
When it\'s this hot, I don\'t feel like doing anything.
Mary\'s dream of going abroad finally became a reality.
